      • readMultipleSubs

        public static java.util.List<com.ui4j.api.dom.Element> readMultipleSubs(com.ui4j.api.dom.Document document)
                                                                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        when there are more than one pages of sub-projects, this method will read all the pages and returns a list with the harvested data
        Parameters:
        document - the page to be read
        Returns:
        List with the data harvested
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        will use the file passed as a parameter to read the project ids (OPS) of the ESPA projects. For the ids found will get all the information, update the database and create a csv file
        Parameters:
        args - the path to the ids file, the download dir, the email authentication information and the database authantication information

        Returns:

      • deleteChars

        public static java.lang.String deleteChars(java.lang.String value)
        deletes or replaces the wrong characters from the supplied string and return it clean to be used on the database Characters to be deleted the percentage symbol (%) and the Euro symbol (â‚¬) Characters to be replaces The greek locale of number has dot (.) for thousands and comma (,) for decimal These will be replaced in a db friendly way. Dot for decimal and no thousand seperators
        Parameters:
        value - the String to check if needs replacements
        Returns:
        The String with the replaced chars

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.String msg)
        saves the log message to the log file and sends it over via email to the addresses supplied
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to be saved and sent via email
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendFromGMail

        private static void sendFromGMail(java.lang.String from,
                 java.lang.String pass,
                 java.lang.String[] to,
                 java.lang.String subject,
                 java.lang.String body)
        send an email to the desired recipients
        Parameters:
        from - the email address of the sender
        pass - the password of the sender
        to - A String[] containing the recipients
        subject - a String containing the subject of the email
        body - a String containing the message to be sent
